import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from "./signup.module.css" import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify' function Signup() { const navigate=useNavigate() const [email, setemail] = useState('') const [password, setpass] = useState('') function handlesubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() console.log('click') axios.post("http://localhost:3001/login",{ email: email, password: password }) .then((response) => { console.log(response.data) if (response.data==true) { navigate('/app/welcome'); } else { navigate('/login') toast.error('Invalid email or password') } }); } return (
{ setemail(e.target.value) }} type="text" className={styles.login__input} placeholder="Email" />
{ setpass(e.target.value) }} type="password" className={styles.login__input} placeholder="Password" />

log in via

) } export default Signup
